title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: Lecture Design Through Educational Video Production and Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish video types according to educational purposes (introduction, modeling, explanation/feedback) and design three or more production strategies
Learners can produce at least one actual lecture video by applying core activities for each of the four stages of video production (planning-development-delivery-reflection).
Learners can propose strategies to enhance learning effectiveness by improving video content at least twice based on feedback from peers and instructors.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
